thread.title: Susan Carland Yassmin Abdel-Magied witch hunt | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Susan Carland Yassmin Abdel-Magied witch hunt | Daily Mail Online

author: Ashleigh Davis For Daily Mail Australia
title: Susan Carland Yassmin Abdel-Magied witch hunt | Daily Mail Online
text: show ad Waleed Aly's wife Susan Carland compares campaign against Yassmin Abdel-Magied to suspected witches being drowned during the Middle Ages - after her claims on Q&A that Islam is 'the most feminine religion' Susan Carland has compared a campaign against Yassmin Abdel-Magied to how suspected witches were treated during the Middle Ages Ms Abdel-Magied was recently met with criticism after her appearance on Q&A On the ABC show she said she regarded Islam to be the most feminist religion A petition was started to have her removed as host of the ABC's Australia Wide Ms Carland said the author was being treated by media as public enemy No. 1
